overview: Tang Shouqiang is desperate for a white-collar life and is desperate for a chance to fulfil his wishes. He was born into a wealthy family and works as a manager, but he has to follow his father, Kao Fu-chiu, in everything he does and cannot resist leaving home. In his desperation, he meets Tang Shouqiang, a young man from the company, and is introduced to a new dimension of life. But in the end, they break up and go their separate ways because of their different backgrounds.
title: 經理後生
